Sentencas: NANOCOFC (Nanocomposites for advanced fuel cell technology) is a research platform/network established based on the FP6 EC-China project www.nanocofc.org.
Titulo: Nanocomposites for Advanced Fuel Cell Technology

Sentencas: This paper reviews major achievements on two-phase nanocomposites for advanced low temperature (300-600 degrees C) solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), where the ceria-salt and ceria-oxide composites are common.
Titulo: Nanocomposites for Advanced Fuel Cell Technology

Sentencas: A typical functional nanocomposite structure is a core-shell type, in which the ceria forms a core and the salt or another oxide form the shell layer.
Titulo: Nanocomposites for Advanced Fuel Cell Technology

Sentencas: Both of them are in the nano-scale and the functional components.
Titulo: Nanocomposites for Advanced Fuel Cell Technology

Sentencas: The high resolution TEM analysis has proven a clear interface in the ceria-based two-phase nanocomposites.
Titulo: Nanocomposites for Advanced Fuel Cell Technology

Sentencas: such interface and interfacial function has resulted in superionic conductivity, above 0.1 S/cm at around 300 degrees C, being comparable to that of conventional SOFC YSZ at 1000 degrees C. Against conventional material design from the structure the advanced nanocomposites are designed by non-structure factors, i.e., the interfaces, and by creating interfacial functionalities between the two constituent phases.
Titulo: Nanocomposites for Advanced Fuel Cell Technology

Sentencas: These new functional materials show indeed a breakthrough in the SOFC materials with great potential.
Titulo: Nanocomposites for Advanced Fuel Cell Technology
